price: Watakuwa wameegemea juu ya viti vya enzi vilivyo pangwa kwa safu. Na tutawaoza mahuru-l-aini.
arabic: مُتَّكِـِٔينَ عَلَىٰ سُرُرٖ مَّصۡفُوفَةٖۖ وَزَوَّجۡنَٰهُم بِحُورٍ عِينٖ
footnotes: Wakikaa nao wameegema juu ya makochi yaliyo pangwa kwa safu. Na tutawaoza wake weupe wenye macho ya vikombe wazuri.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: muttakiīna ʿalā sururin maṣfūfatin wazawwajnāhum biḥūrin ʿīnin
